directions: Mash avocado in a bowl using a fork until smooth. Stir salsa, mayonnaise, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, and garlic powder into mashed avocado using a fork. Gradually stir refried bean into dip. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 large avocado - peeled, pitted, and quartered
title: Captain's Avocado Bean Dip
